remarks: Transfer "at most one" restricted quantification from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
statement:
rmoxfrd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C ) -> A e. B ) $.
rmoxfrd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E! y e. C x = A ) $.
rmoxfrd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rmoxfrd $p |- ( ph -> ( E* x e. B ps <-> E* y e. C ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
